title: Fireside With The Underboss - "I Hung Up The Phone 10 Minutes Later Swat Was At My Door"
description: Sammy goes in for questioning in Quantico with a heavyweight agent from Washington, and he is instructed to keep his composure during the conversation. Sammy does his best, but towards the end of their talk things get a little dicey.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy goes in for questioning in Quantico with a heavyweight agent from Washington, and he is instructed to keep his composure during the conversation. Sammy does his best, but towards the end of their talk things get a little dicey.
